name: Codes Health
headline: Perfect medical histories.
description: Codes automates patient record collection. Today, documents are scattered across EHRs, providers, and faxes; we use AI to compile & analyze docs for those who need them.
tags: industry:health-tech; industry:b2b; industry:healthcare; industry:legaltech; industry:ai; location:new-york

# Get better (and faster) patient histories, automatically.
[ Book a Demo ](https://www.getcodeshealth.com/<#>)
![Dashboard Main](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bbc73a2f578c16193f6c5b_Group%2013605616%20\(10\).png)
## Pull patient records from multiple medical contexts
![Icon 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bacd9429e48ef3ce519bdc_cloudia.png)
### Health Information Exchanges
We pull live patient documentation from all of the major HIEs.
![Icon 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bacdba7261fc989929d8d6_Group%2013605630.png)
### External Providers
And gather records from the patient's previous providers on your behalf. 
![Icon 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bacdc5171f42e6aec273f7_breather%20\(1\).png)
### Patient Data
While also collecting and processing files patients have on-hand.
![Card 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bad7c819f5242d476dbc61_Group%2013606548%20\(3\).png)![Card 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bad815970af5e30eabdb86_Group%2013606549%20\(1\).png)
![Card 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bad835fc5ba5a52cf2cd2a_Group%2013606550.png)
![BG pattern 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66baac6550d8f63420df0f3c_Pattern%20\(1\).png)
![Left Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bade1f2eec02e804f16702_Icon.png)
For Patients
## Digital intake and release of information (ROI)
We help your patients complete their release of information correctly, the first time around. All from the comfort of their phone (or browser). 
![Icon 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66baac6550d8f63420df0f34_Frame%201000000864%20\(1\).svg)
Provider verification
Codes confirms all listed doctors against our provider database, correcting common entry mistakes.
![Icon 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66baac6550d8f63420df0f32_Frame%201000000864.svg)
Fax number lookup
Once the patient signs the ROI, we find the corresponding fax number for each listed provider.
![Left Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66baac6550d8f63420df0f17_light-bulb.svg)
For Providers
## The best assistant your backoffice could ever ask for
### Set custom requirements for service types
We verify if the patient qualifies for care depending on your intake/service requirements.
![Card 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bad9ccea3a6cd667b39965_Group%2013605612.png)
### Automated provider followups
Codes calls and emails unresponsive providers. 
![Card 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66badaac504d59e3f6935237_Group%2013606551.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66badd452dacc5cd84db7992_Group%2013606553%20\(2\).png)
### Document artificial intelligence
AI reads through all intake records to make clinical summaries and recommendations. 
![Card 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66bb81e0574a3594a6a44b57_Frame%202610495%20\(2\).png)
### Track live progress for all requests
Codes provides live status updates for all outstanding document requests, including those that are in danger of delaying a new service or patient appointment.
### Backed by the best investors in the world.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/671a9ba7a82d9ecd64a7d229_image%2013.png)
## YCombinator
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/671a9bd76ad83cf6a04848a2_image%2015.png)
## Haystack Ventures
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/671a9c5ee13b6db1273dc721_nc.png)
## Night Capital
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/671a9c8c7f48c7dfeeef4f38_image%2016.png)
## General Catalyst
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/671a9cbc7077ef4a81c2c1df_image%2014.png)
## Pathlight Ventures
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66baac6450d8f63420df0eca/66baace6be93ca3a0f2eedc5_Group%2013605573.png)](https://www.getcodeshealth.com/</>)

generated_description:
**Codes Health: Streamlining Medical Histories with AI**

If you're in healthcare or even just someone who has navigated the labyrinth of patient records, you’ll understand the struggle. Enter *Codes Health*, founded in 2024 and emerging out of Y Combinator's S24 batch. With a mission aimed at creating perfect medical histories, Codes Health aims to eliminate the chaos of scattered documents across electronic health records (EHRs), providers, and faxes. By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, they compile and analyze necessary documents into cohesive patient histories that are easy to access and understand.

Based in New York, Codes Health operates with a lean team of three—yes, just three folks pushing a big idea. Their offering serves both healthcare providers and lawyers, aligning clinical needs with legal documentation in a seamless service. The company focuses on pulling live patient documentation from major health information exchanges, gathering records from previous providers, and even processing patient-held files. It’s an efficient way for both practitioners and patients to manage medical history, reducing time and improving accuracy.

One standout feature? Their digital intake and release of information (ROI) process helps ensure that patients can complete their release forms correctly—right from their phones. They even verify provider information to eliminate common entry mistakes and provide real-time updates for requests, acting almost like the most diligent assistant your backoffice could dream of.

Codes Health is tagging itself as part of the *health-tech*, *B2B*, *legaltech*, and of course, *AI* sectors—demonstrating their aim to revolutionize how medical information flows in the digital age. The backing of notable investors like Y Combinator, Haystack Ventures, Night Capital, General Catalyst, and Pathlight Ventures brings a level of credibility and excitement to their endeavor.

As they continue to grow, Codes Health is making patient record automation not just a dream but an achievable reality, one document at a time. If you’re looking to make sense of the medical record mess, you might want to look into what they’re doing or book a demo to see their solution in action.

For more on how they're changing the healthcare documentation landscape, check out [Codes Health](https://www.getcodeshealth.com/).
